title: Search
description: Perform a search given a Guided Search query.

url.description: A Guided Search URL that can include a path and a set of query parameters.

getNextPage.description: If set to true, use the paging action template for the existing search results in order to get the next page of results.

dimensionId.description: A dimension id to be used for constructing a query path of the form '/_/N-dimensionId'.

searchServicePath.description: The path of the search service to be used (default: 'Default/osf/catalog').
